name: Catch the Thief 3D
description:
Welcome to Catch the thief 3D!

You're a security guard, working in a place full of thieves.

Do your job, chase them, catch them, earn money & upgrade your skills!

Play among tons of levels & different environments in this easy to play game.

The control is easy to handle, the rule is easy to understand, we are sure you'll have lot of fun playing our game :)

Enjoy the game, and do not hesitate to let any feedback!
